name: Rush: Web app prototyping kit
description:
Hey Figma!


Rush is an open, expandable prototyping kit to help creators convey their ideas in a faster, more interactive way.


Let me know in the comments what components I should be adding!


Changelog


V1.0.2 // 26.11.2021

New additions:

  • Comment Box pattern
  • Data Display pattern
  • Percentage increase / Decrease component
  • Order Summary pattern


V1.0.1 // 23.11.2021

New additions:

  • 404 page
  • Hero section
  • Minimal dashboard
  • Side menu variants

Improvements:

  • Fixed responsiveness on some of the components
  • Adjusted color palette


V1.0.0 // 17.11.2021

The first version of Rush launched!


Roadmap

  • Make all components 100% responsive
  • Create lists, grid, feed and table components
